episodes.title: A Flight to Remember
episodes.plot: The crew takes a vacation cruise on the maiden voyage of the new space Titanic.

episodes.title: Mars University
episodes.plot: Fry matriculates at Mars University and competes with a monkey made smart by Prof. Farnsworth's latest invention while Bender tries to make the local chapter of his robot fraternity cool.

episodes.title: When Aliens Attack
episodes.plot: A monumental attack from Lrrr of Omicron Persei 8 is precipitated by the loss of a television signal that Fry disrupted in 1999.

episodes.title: Fry and the Slurm Factory
episodes.plot: Fry wins a contest to visit the factory of his favorite addictive drink, but danger ensues when he accidentally discovers the real factory.

episodes.title: I Second That Emotion
episodes.plot: Bender flushes Nibbler down the toilet in a fit of jealousy, which prompts Professor Farnsworth to implant in him a chip that will allow him to feel empathy.

episodes.title: Brannigan, Begin Again
episodes.plot: Zapp Brannigan gets thrown out of the service for destroying a space meeting and as a result of this he begins to work for Planet Express.

episodes.title: A Head in the Polls
episodes.plot: When a mine disaster causes the market value of titanium to soar, Bender becomes highly profitable and sells his body.

episodes.title: Xmas Story
episodes.plot: Fry learns how Christmas has changed and remained the same over the last 1000 years when a Robot Santa terrorizes New New York.

episodes.title: Why Must I Be a Crustacean in Love?
episodes.plot: When the group begins to notice that Zoidberg is acting erratically, Professor Farnsworth deduces that it is mating season on his home planet.

episodes.title: Put Your Head on My Shoulders
episodes.plot: After a horrendous accident requires his body to be rebuilt, Fry's head is attached to the shoulder of a co-worker while Bender opens a dating service just in time for Valentine's Day.

episodes.title: The Lesser of Two Evils
episodes.plot: Suspicion falls on a new employee when a shipment goes missing.

episodes.title: Raging Bender
episodes.plot: Bender becomes a champion robot wrestler.

episodes.title: A Bicyclops Built for Two
episodes.plot: After learning that there is a second Cyclops still in existence, Leela travels back to her home World to ensure that her species does not go extinct.

episodes.title: How Hermes Requisitioned His Groove Back
episodes.plot: Hermes decide to relax at a spa after receiving a depressing demotion, but he instead unwittingly enrolled himself at a forced labor camp.

episodes.title: A Clone of My Own
episodes.plot: Prof. Farnsworth reveals that he cloned himself years ago and introduces his clone to the Planet Express staff.

episodes.title: The Deep South
episodes.plot: While stranded at the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean with the rest of the Planet Express crew, Fry meets a mermaid and quickly falls in love.

episodes.title: Bender Gets Made
episodes.plot: Bender gets inducted into the Robot mafia but has a crisis of conscience when their next score involves his friends on the Planet Express ship.

episodes.title: The Problem with Popplers
episodes.plot: The Planet Express crew discovers a delicious snack food on a remote planet, but Leela has a change of heart when she discovers a disturbing fact about the snack food that endangers Earth.

episodes.title: Mother's Day
episodes.plot: When Mom of Mom's Robot Factory takes control of every robot on Earth, the only man who can save the planet is Prof. Farnsworth.

episodes.title: Anthology of Interest I
episodes.plot: The Professor's "What If" machine answers 4 questions.
